summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNARS Powermatte Lipstick is a high-intensity matte formula that glides on bold color with 10-hour wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsBold color sets to a smooth, matte finish with a lightweight feel10 high-intensity shades for strong lip looks that last for 10 hoursFeaturesTransformative cream-to-matte textureTransfer-resistant, high-intensity colorKey IngredientsPower Pigment Complex: a dynamic blend of pure pigments suspended in rich, emollient oils and color-locking ingredients - to saturate lips with dense color that glides on effortlessly and wears comfortablyItem 2599873How To UseUse tip of bullet to define the Cupid's bow, starting at the center of the lips, then moving out. Use flat surface of bullet to fill bottom lip.Note: Twist the bullet slightly to dispense the right amount of product for one application. After each use, close cap tightly.Ingredients112 AmericanWoman: Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Caprylyl Methicone, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Wax, Lauroyl Lysine, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polysilicone-11, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use tip of bullet to define the Cupid's bow, starting at the center of the lips, then moving out. Use flat surface of bullet to fill bottom lip.Note: Twist the bullet slightly to dispense the right amount of product for one application. After each use, close cap tightly.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lipstick - it goes on smooth and stays on well! The color is perfect and matches everything!  I would recommend trying, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.headline: I need it in every color!
reviews.comments: Stays on seamlessly. Can survive and entire workday without reapplication.  Doesn't dry or my lips...  feels like butter! So so so good!!

reviews.headline: Nice color. A bit drying.
reviews.comments: Color is nice and lasts a good while. Is a bit drying, but not as drying as most matte formulas.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: This makes my lips feel amazing- very, very soft. Love the formula!

reviews.headline: I want to buy more!
reviews.comments: I got a sample, tried it - loved it and wanted a more gentle, neutral color (the sample was Dragon Girl, I purchased Tease Me).  I absolutely love this for swiping one once and just going about my day - it stays put but will not dry.  I do dab just a touch of the Nars Lip Oil on because it looks and feels nice.

reviews.headline: I would not purchase again.
reviews.comments: The product went on smooth , however, after about 30 minutes it started to look flakey and lifted from my lips .

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: These were patchy on me, not pigmented enough, and didn't last very long. Im not a fan. I wont be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: Brown lipliner and this color lipstick is a must have.  Love the color combo ðŸ’–

reviews.headline: Wonderful product!!
reviews.comments: This is a great color!! Very comparable to another one of my lipsticks that I love but this one from NARS is amazing!!! Stays on all day!!! No budging!!! Highly recommend this one!!!

reviews.headline: Love this lipstick!
reviews.comments: I love this lipstick, love the formula but I will say this type of lipstick has better coverage with the lighter shades. If they're on the darker side then it comes out looking blotchy and you feel like you use a good amount on each application.

reviews.headline: Too drying
reviews.comments: I was underwhelmed w/this lipstick. I only use matte lipsticks so I'm very familiar with what they entail, but this one was overly drying and felt heavy on my lips; it did stay put at first, but towards the end of the day was faded.I used my Mac lip primer & exfoliated & still a big NO for me! Will stick to the Nars liquid lipstickâ€¦still the winner and stays put all day!

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: It's not a bad product. I was just very underwhelmed. I bought this for my wedding. After reading lots of reviews I figured this could be my pop of color with a bold lip I wouldn't have to babysit. I am glad I took it for a test drive. This transferred like crazy all over everything. It was super matte but it never fully set. I have better drug store matte lips. Sad I fell for the hype.

reviews.headline: Will have to exchange it
reviews.comments: I am not impressed by the color or the long lasting.  It does not last and I will return this product.

reviews.headline: Disappointing :(
reviews.comments: Bought this in shade thunder kiss and was super excited for it. I love the liquid lips so I had high hopes for this, but it went on horribly. I tried adding a gloss and it still looked rough. Idk about longlasting since it took it off immediatly but it didnt seem like it was going to stay on lol.

reviews.headline: It's a great lipstick but not long lasting.
reviews.comments: Comfortable, great color, all of the things. But not particularly long lasting. I would recommend as a great lipstick but wouldn't use its lasting time as a selling point.

reviews.headline: Overpriced
reviews.comments: I bought this in American woman and I keep going back and forth on whether to return it because its completely average. I decided to splurge because the color was right and I figured it must be amazing by the ratings but its barely ok. It is off my lips in an hour, its chalky so you must use lip gloss and its so expensive you get angry when you look in the mirror and only my lipliner is still on.

reviews.headline: I won't buy this again
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this as it's NARS, but yuck.  This is no better than drugstore makeup.  Shade is muddy, doesn't last, smears, and is too warm for my cool skin.

reviews.headline: long lasting and minimal transfer!
reviews.comments:
i LOVE this lipstick, and despite being a verified cheap-o, i've bought two shades and plan for at least one more. i work in childcare, so while i love a bold lip, i needed something that would a) require minimal upkeep and prep, b) last at least 5 hours (i often don't get a second to reapply until then!) and c) wouldn't transfer, because smooching little ones is the best part of the job. i've tried maybelline, rimmel, nyx, wet n wild, urban decay, macâ€¦ nothing fit the bill. if the color was right, it got everywhere; if it didn't transfer, it also didn't last more than 2 hours. so i tried this on a whim and found it not only stayed with extremely minimal fading for 6+ hours, but barely left even a hint of color on the travel mug i drink from all day. i use my powermatte lipsticks nearly every single day now and almost never have to reapply.

however there are some caveats!
- while drinking has almost no effect but a very light fading in the center of my lips, eating can, especially if it's an oily meal or something where you're pressing your mouth to the food a lot, like a burger. so i do reapply after eating. 
- like all mattes, it can be a little drying, but some nice lip balm at bedtime handles that.
- it can dry down a little darker than expected, particularly if you use lipliner underneath. i never bother with lipliner, just apply directly, and i've found the color stays best that way.

so far i've tried the shades dragon girl and tease me. dragon girl is a beautiful true blue-red, and great for those days where you want to look a little put together but don't want to do much: just slap it on and you instantly look done up. tease me is a dusty rose color, great for everyday, and goes with almost anything. the colors are very close to the website, maybe a tiny bit darker in real life. definitely, definitely recommended if you want something long lasting that doesn't get everywhere!

reviews.headline: This product is unexpectedly good
reviews.comments: It's a winner. Stays on remain the color it says it is! Pretty smooth application and make your lupd are not chapped when you apply!

reviews.headline: NoNO. it s false advertisingâ€¦â€¦ does not last an hour
reviews.comments: The color is pretty but it does not last an hour

media.headline: So pigmented
media.caption: Here's a video of it swatches â¤ï¸

faceoff_positive.comments: The NARS Powermatte High-Intensity Lipstick in the shade American Woman is a unique, innovative matte lipstick formula like I have never experienced! It glides easily on the lips like a balm, feels absolutely weightless, dries down to a smooth, powdery matte finish, and doesn't dry out my lips! The shade is a beautiful bold dusty mauve and it hugs my lips in the best way possible. It's long lasting, doesn't bleed (so no need for a lip liner), and stays in place for 10+ hours. The slim and curved shape of the lipstick makes applying it quick and easy. The outer component is rectangular shape and has a luxurious soft-touch matte texture so it won't slip out of your hands. Has a nice weight and the lid locks into place when you hear/feel the click. The color of the entire outer component matches the shade inside so you're never left guessing which shade you're reaching for and the lipstick twists down below the protective tube so you need not worry about smashing it with the cap. This is the most comfortable matte lipstick formula I've ever worn and I love how it doesn't exaggerate my lip lines, leaving my lips with a smooth, soft looking finish.
faceoff_positive.headline: Weightless, Bold, Transfer-proof

faceoff_negative.comments: I must have gotten a bad batch or something, because this was awful. It was grainy and came off almost immediately. Being "transfer-proof" is completely dishonest and inaccurate. Disappointing from such an acclaimed brand.
faceoff_negative.headline: Grainy and NOT Long Lasting
